tha-ap387:0.3_0: As he was approaching, he had, so hard to find.
tha-ap387:1.4_0: and mounted the fruits of the past.
tha-ap387:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap387:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap387:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap387:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap387:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pajjota.
tha-ap387:7.1_0: and inclusion, the fifth of the senior monks.
